name: openkeynav
description: OpenKeyNav: A JavaScript plugin for enhancing keyboard navigation and accessibility on web pages.

scripts.build: babel src -d dist && terser dist/openkeynav.js -o dist/openkeynav.min.js
scripts.patch: npm version patch --force && npm run update-version-js
scripts.build_patch: npm run build && npm run patch && git add --all; git commit -m "build and patch"

author: Lawrence Weru
